summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the levy and collection of a new assessment or re-assessment to pay the cost and expense of and for the improvement of Seattle Boulevard, from Plummer Street to 9th Avenue South, and Massachusetts Street; 9th Avenue South, from Massachusetts Street to Seattle Boulevard; Seattle Boulevard, from 9th Avenue South to 8th Avenue South; and 8th Avenue South, from Seattle Boulevard to Charlestown Street, as specified and provided for in Ordinance No. 9777, and providing payment therefor.
